name: Energy Revolution System — Cut Your Electricity Bill by 68%
shortDescription: DIY home energy system that can slash your electricity bill by up to 68%. Build it in a weekend for under $200 using parts from any hardware store.

The program is part of the larger EPC Workshop ecosystem, which has produced multiple 7-figure ClickBank offers including Aqua Tower, Water Freedom System, and Ultimate Off-Grid Generator. Affiliates benefit from a proven, high-converting funnel with multiple upsells, making average order values significantly higher than the front-end price.
